||[}}}°.•°.°•..°•°[|||{{{

WASD or arrows - move

LMB  - rotate camera

mousewheel - zoom

Q - highlight stuff if you're stuck (this will probably not happen)

P - screenshot.png

fullscreen+sound are recommended for your engagement with this "Hideous Cave Goblin Interactive Experience"™

made with aloelazoe's bitsy 3d it's good check it out/give her money

bitsy hacks by Sean LeBlanc
